newsitem.title: INDIA: India's Congress backs premier Deve Gowda - Kesri.
newsitem.headline: India's Congress backs premier Deve Gowda - Kesri.

text.p: India's Congress party has no plan to withdraw support for Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda's United Front coalition government, the new leader of Congress's parliamentary delegation, Sitaram Kesri, said on Friday.
"All this talk about our withdrawing support to the United Front is wrong. It is a ploy to frighten you," Kesri told a meeting of the Congress Parliamentary Party (CPP).
Earlier on Friday, Kesri was unanimously chosen to replace former prime minister P.V. Narasimha Rao as CPP leader.
Deve Gowda's centre-left minority coalition depends on Congress' support to survive a challenge from the Hindu nationalist opposition in the lower house of parliament.
